# Dairy Calculator Project Instructions

- Platform: Expo React Native mobile app
- Main goal: Dairy product seller app with settings-managed products and home-page calculator
- Required features:
  - Add products with name, price, and image
  - Show products on Home page with quantity input per product
  - Auto-calculate line totals and grand total
  - Provide clear button to reset quantities
  - Persist products locally
- Android readiness:
  - Keep Android package id in `app.json`
  - Keep EAS build profiles in `eas.json` for APK (`preview`) and AAB (`production`)
- Development prerequisites:
  - Node.js 20.19.4 or newer
  - npm install before running
